author: pokkagreentea100
comment: I'm not too sure, but I suppose that it will be covered the next term. Right now, I have asked my teacher regarding it, but I don't expect a fast reply since it's the term break. Right now, all I did was to download the necessary stuff & create the website design. maybe you can get started on the design.

author: yvonne1298_
comment: dont start the design first!! if u start the design then there would be alot of deletion later needed on as ur design is hard coded. start on backend like inserting mock data and verifying them.

```json
  "suggestions": ["Start with backend development (inserting and verifying mock data) before designing the frontend to avoid significant design deletions later."]
}
```
